output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(data.table)

DT <- data.table(
        x = letters[1:3],
        y = list( 1:10,
                  letters[1:4],
                  data.table(a=1:3, b=4:6)
                  )
        )

DT
```

```{r}
# select row in column x that has "c"
DT[x == "c"]
```

```{r}
# assign result when x == "c"
dt.c <- DT[x == "c"]
```


```{r}
# select column y
dt.c$y
```

```{r}
dt.c.y <- dt.c$y
class(dt.c.y)
names(dt.c.y)
length(dt.c.y)
```
